title: Axis Bank completes migration of Citibank customers to its systems
description: Axis Bank faced glitches after migrating Citibank customers to its systems, with many unable to access accounts or log into the Axis app. Axis acknowledged "teething issues" and increased call center staff to address them. Despite problems, 97% of users successfully onboarded, with over a million transactions completed.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
